channel.title: [Pi] Really weird error [Pi]
channel.description:
Im trying to add dragon claw special to my server. I fixed the speed of my special animation to the real one. But i got some errors.. [code]src\server\model\players\Client.java:524: incompatible types found : boolean required: int usingClaws = false; ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:286: operator ! cannot be applied to int if(c.doubleHit && !c.usingClaws) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:289: operator && cannot be applied to boolean,int if(c.doubleHit && c.usingClaws) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:995: operator ! cannot be applied to int if(c.doubleHit && !c.usingClaws) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:998: operator && cannot be applied to boolean,int if(c.doubleHit && c.usingClaws) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1903: incompatible types found : boolean required: int c.usingClaws = true; ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 6 errors Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .[/code]
LIKE WHAT?

item.title: [Pi] Really weird error [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @Niv3k Niv3k
item.description:
@Niv3k wrote:

Im trying to add dragon claw special to my server.
I fixed the speed of my special animation to the real one.
But i got some errorsâ€¦

src\server\model\players\Client.java:524: incompatible types found : boolean required: int usingClaws = false; ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:286: operator ! cannot be applied to int if(c.doubleHit && !c.usingClaws) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:289: operator && cannot be applied to boolean,int if(c.doubleHit && c.usingClaws) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:995: operator ! cannot be applied to int if(c.doubleHit && !c.usingClaws) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:998: operator && cannot be applied to boolean,int if(c.doubleHit && c.usingClaws) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1903: incompatible types found : boolean required: int c.usingClaws = true; ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 6 errors Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .
